mapper.insert: insert into Fcube (Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, CommentCount) values (#{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cubetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{influence,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{placeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pointreward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{influencereward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{activationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cubepassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{haspassword,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubescope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{influencelevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cubehits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubelikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cubedislikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{joinplayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maximumplayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starpoints,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{expgiveflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{makeexp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{commentcount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update Fcube set Uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CubeName = #{cubename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CubeType = #{cubetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MakeTime = #{maketime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Influence = #{influence,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CubeState = #{cubestate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PlaceAddress = #{placeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AdministrativeArea = #{administrativearea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PointReward = #{pointreward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, InfluenceReward = #{influencereward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ActivationTime = #{activationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CubePassword = #{cubepassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HasPassword = #{haspassword,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CubeScope = #{cubescope,jdbcType=INTEGER}, InfluenceLevel = #{influencelevel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CubeHits = #{cubehits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CubeLikes = #{cubelikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CubeDisLikes = #{cubedislikes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JoinPlayer = #{joinplayer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MaximumPlayers = #{maximumplayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, StarPoints = #{starpoints,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ExpGiveFlag = #{expgiveflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MakeExp = #{makeexp,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CommentCount = #{commentcount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, CommentCount from Fcube where Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints, ExpGiveFlag, MakeExp, CommentCount from Fcube

SELECT Cubeuuid, Uid, longitude, latitude, CubeName, CubeType, MakeTime, Influence, CubeState, PlaceAddress, AdministrativeArea, Country, PointReward, InfluenceReward, ActivationTime, CubePassword, HasPassword, CubeScope, InfluenceLevel, CubeHits, CubeLikes, CubeDisLikes, JoinPlayer, MaximumPlayers, StarPoints,ExpGiveFlag,MakeExp FROM Fcube WHERE Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid} FOR UPDATE
SELECT Cubeuuid, Uid,CubeState ,ActivationTime,ExpGiveFlag,MakeExp FROM Fcube WHERE Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid} FOR UPDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE Fcube SET JoinPlayer = #{joinplayer} where Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE Fcube SET CubeHits = #{cubehits} Where Cubeuuid = #{cubeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select Cubeuuid,ActivationTime,CubeState FROM Fcube WHERE CubeState != 2 AND
ActivationTime < now()
